title: Heritage Glen Townhomes Has Units Coming Available!
posting_body: We are currently taking applicants for our spacious townhomes in Taylor!
Gas, heat, and water are included.
You will be responsible for your DTE bill!
Other units currently available at Westminster Park:
Other units currently available at Heritage Glen:

In order to qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3 times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior evictions or monies owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.
We also ask for your most recent paystubs at least 4, a copy of your social security card and ID.
Application fees are $35.00 per adult and we need a separate money order of $50.00 to hold and process the application.
If you have any questions, we are here Mon-Fri from 9-6PM and Sat.
Due to Covid-19, please use our phone number and email for communication.
PRICES AND AVAILABILTY ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE!!!
ALL SECURITY DEPOSITS ARE NON-REFUNDABLE ONCE YOU PUT ONE DOWN!!!!
For more information give Haley a call at
